h4.img: Glen Rose ISD received an A+ rating and was rated the 22nd Best School District of 1,069 in the state of Texas. This study places Glen Rose ISD in the top 2% academically in the state of Texas. GRISD was also rated #2 in Best Places to Teach in Texas, #10 Best Teachers in Texas and #22 Safest School in Texas.

div.h4: Nationally, Glen Rose ISD was rated #246 of 10,758 Best School Districts in America, also placing Glen Rose ISD in the top 2% academically in the nation. (READ FULL ARTICLE)

h4.a: GRHS Named 2017 Best High School Bronze Medal by U.S. News and World Report
